title: Former Senegalese President Macky Sall's barely concealed ambition to become UN Secretary-General
subhead: Since leaving office in 2024, the former head of state has traveled back and forth between conventions and international conferences, amplifying Africa's voice and fueling his desire to succeed Antonio Guterres at the helm of the United Nations.

title: Crashed Lisbon funicular had faulty cable, investigation says
subhead: Portugal's air and rail accident investigations bureau wrote in a note published three days after the tragedy that a cable linking two cabins disconnected shortly before the September 3 incident. The official inquiry recommended the city's vehicles stay out of service until their safety can be confirmed.

title: 'The Gaza agreement is fragile, but the Americans are on top of it': Words of hope from an Israeli peace broker
subhead: Researcher and activist Gershon Baskin, who has been involved in ceasefire efforts in Gaza, rejects the Netanyahu government's claim that Hamas is reluctant to return the bodies of hostages who died in the enclave. He also argues that demilitarization is not out of reach.

title: The wild Albanian island where the Trumps want to build a luxury hotel
subhead: Once a Cold War military outpost, this Mediterranean island, known for its lush vegetation and turquoise waters, had long been left abandoned. But Jared Kushner saw its tourism potential. Leveraging his network that blurs geopolitics and private interests, Donald Trump's son-in-law easily secured Albanian approval to build a luxury hotel complex in the heart of this protected landscape.

title: Zaho de Sagazan: 'Without others, without friendship, you can't achieve much'
